Title: Relates to funding for the child care facilitated enrollment program
Summary: Amends the aid to localities budget relating to funding for the child care facilitated enrollment program to direct administration of such program by the NYS AFL-CIO Workforce Development Institute.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 53 of the laws of 2021, enacting the aid to localities budget, in relation to funding for the child care facilitated enrollment program
